data.caption: Clarification - Financial Results
data.news_body: The Exchange has sought clarification from Madhav Copper Limited for the quarter ended 30-Sep-2025 with respect to Regulation 33 of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015. On basis of above the Company is required to clarify the following:  The response of the Company is awaited.
